QuestData.Title: All Aboard!
QuestData.Description: You hear all of that, $n? There are Alliance that need killing and I need to round up a veteran crew.$b$bYou're coming with me!$b$bWe won't be returning until our assignment's complete, so round up your things and make ready.$b$bI'll be aboard a newly commissioned gunship over Bladefist Bay.$b$bDon't keep me waiting!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to General Nazgrim aboard Hellscream's Fist.
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome aboard Hellscream's Fist, $n!$b$bThis'll be her maiden voyage. Ain't she a beauty?

Objectives.Objective: Secure a flight to Hellscream's Fist
Speak to General Nazgrim aboard Hellscream's Fist
